nodeList.loreText: As they sow, so shall they reap.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Conjures a tornado that moves at random, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing physical damage to them.

nodeList.description: Tornado casts {Lightning} more frequently.

node.altText: The lightning scales with increased spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.
node.description: Tornado casts {Lightning} every 2 seconds, a spell that deals lightning damage to the nearest enemy.
node.nodeDescription: Tornadoes cast lightning at the nearest enemy every 2 seconds.

node.loreText: As they sow, so shall they reap.
node.nodeDescription: Conjures a tornado that moves at random, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing physical damage to them.

nodeList.description: Tornadoes cast {Storm Orbs} more frequently.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Tornadoes leave storm orbs [20%] more frequently per point

node.altText: Storm orbs explode after one second dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.\n\nStorm orbs scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.
node.description: Tornado now create a {Storm Orb} every second, but Tornado has less cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: 20% reduced cast speed. Tornado creates a storm orb nearby once every second.

node.nodeDescription: [22%] increased base damage and [5%] increased mana cost per point

node.loreText: As they sow, so shall they reap.
node.nodeDescription: Conjures a tornado that moves at random, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing physical damage to them.

nodeList.description: Tornadoes have a chance to ignite nearby enemies each second, but Tornado has less cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: 20% reduced cast speed. Tornadoes have a 20% chance to ignite nearby enemies every second.

node.altText: Fire tornado scales with increases to fire damage, not physical damage.
node.description:
Tornados' base physical damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Tornado deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: 10% increased base damage, 100% of base physical damage converted to base fire damage.

node.description: Tornado has an increased cast speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased cast speed per point

nodeList.description: Tornado is now instant cast and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but now has a 4 second cooldown.

node.description: Tornado deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and attach to you wherever you move, but you can no longer cast additional Tornadoes at once.
